docs.lead_paragraph: The steamship Hermann arrived yesterday morning, from Southampton and London on the 13th. Of course her news has been anticipated. She brings the mails, however, and from them we make some extracts:
docs.snippet: The steamship Hermann arrived yesterday morning, from Southampton and London on the 13th. Of course her news has been anticipated. She brings the mails, however, and from them we make some extracts:

headline.main: LONG ISLAND.; Queens Country Agricultural Fair. LONG ISLAND FARMING.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Aunual Fair of the Queens County Agricaltural Society was hold on Thursday at Jamaica, on the grounds of Hon. Jony A. KING, President of the Society.
docs.snippet: The Aunual Fair of the Queens County Agricaltural Society was hold on Thursday at Jamaica, on the grounds of Hon. Jony A. KING, President of the Society.

headline.main: NEW-YORK CITY.; The Bewery Extension. Irishmen's Union. Literary Societies. The Recent Jewerly Robbery. Financial Exhibits of the Office. Investlgntion before Judge Ingraham. Alleged Defalcation of Mr. Garret Dyckman. THE CITY REGISTER. Rev. Dr Cox. The Kidanpping Affair. Fire. COURT OF SPECIAL SESSIONS. COURT CALENDAR-SATURDAY. LAW INTELLIGENCE.
A Wanderer's Gleanings in the Empire State.; Trenton Falls--Anecdots, & c. NUMBER TWO.

docs.lead_paragraph: I yielded to the temptation of visiting Trenton Falls, because it is a famous place and a great resort, but without feeling at all the curiosity or interest I had always felt in seeing Niagara or the.Falls of St. Anthony.
docs.snippet: I yielded to the temptation of visiting Trenton Falls, because it is a famous place and a great resort, but without feeling at all the curiosity or interest I had always felt in seeing Niagara or the.Falls of St. Anthony.

docs.lead_paragraph: Hamilton.square is in a bustle of confusion, getting ready for the State Agricultural Fair which opens on the 3d of next month. Elsewhere in our paper we tell what they are doing, and what the prospects are for as handsome a turn out of fine cattle, agricultural implements, garden products, and of people to see them, as ever were promised for any State Fair.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Cunard screw steamship Alps, from Liverpool on the 13th instant, arrived at this port between 8 and 9 o'clock this morning. Her advices are four days later than those received by the Arabia.
docs.snippet: The Cunard screw steamship Alps, from Liverpool on the 13th instant, arrived at this port between 8 and 9 o'clock this morning. Her advices are four days later than those received by the Arabia.

docs.lead_paragraph: A few days since we stated that a new fishing ground for whales had been discovered in the Arctic regions, and that the parties interested had concealed much of the information relating to it. The London Times, received by the last arrival, contains fuller particulars of this important discovery, from which we have gleaned some facts in addition to those before given.

headline.main: Excessive Study in the Public Schools.

docs.lead_paragraph: Our city prides itself on the superiority of its public schools; and we think Boston is justly entitled to take the highest rank among the cities of he civilized world, for the facilities afforded by its. citizens for the education of youth.
docs.snippet: Our city prides itself on the superiority of its public schools; and we think Boston is justly entitled to take the highest rank among the cities of he civilized world, for the facilities afforded by its. citizens for the education of youth.
